page.title: 08A Resident's View-Mr.Bennett
page.content: {Mr.Alfred Bennett}has lived in Aberford all his life and was born here.He has a cycle and general shop in Main St.South.Mr.Bennett remembers a number of incidents including some interesting events from the Second World War when 3 bombs were dropped at Lotherton and 3 more in Parlington Woods. He also remembers a Canadian bomber crashing in Hayton Wood.In 1983 Mr.Bennett was co-author of a book about Aberford called "Aberford in Times Past".He has a great knowledge of the history of Aberford and he is well known and respected locally.He has an extensive collection of old and interesting photographs.Mr.Bennett likes the tranquility of Aberford and hopes that any future building will be strictly controlled so that the village will not lose its charm and peaceful atmosphere.
